education.degree: College of Computing and Software Engineering, M.S. Computer Science
College of the Arts, B.M. Music Performance

work.description: I worked on an internal benefits program that was used by tens of thousands of Amazon employees each year. I led the design and development of several software components and features such as a system for automatically synchronizing data between a legacy system and newer applications hosted in AWS.

I leveraged a variety of technologies to help solve problems our clients were facing. I further developed my command of both front-end and back-end technologies, gained new experience with a variety of cloud services, and improved my communication and teamwork skills.

Working as the sole software developer on a team I designed, implemented, and supported an internal business application that was used by thousands of UPS employees globally. This application supported these employees to provide a higher level of customer service and resulted in millions of dollars of additional revenue just in the first year of limited roll out.

projects.name: eslint-plugin-ordered-imports
description: Provides an ESLint plugin which enforces customizable import ordering rules

projects.name: vulkanalia
description: Provides Rust bindings to Vulkan (a graphics and GPU computing API)
